item.description: Hi all! I thought I would try something new on the North Shore area Stump Trivia at Grumpy Doyles in Reading. I'm going to find out more information but I believe it is teams of 6. If I have enough interest I will. Do this as a repeat event on Tuesdays. Grumpy Doyles has really decent food and a yummy bar. I. Will set this up and see how. Many people sign up for our neck of the woods. I believe there is a bus and will find out more information.
item.how_to_find_us: We will have tables in the bar area.
item.name: Grumpy Doyle's in Reading
